input_data.title: Temple
input_data.overview: Talented and successful surgeon Daniel Milton has his world shattered when his wife Beth develops a fatal degenerative disease. After conventional treatment options run out, Daniel partners with the lonely yet resourceful Lee to start a literal Underground clinic in the vast network of tunnels beneath Temple Tube Station in London.

response.analytical_summary: Temple is a British crime drama that blends medical thriller elements with a gritty exploration of London's underground. The series follows a brilliant surgeon who, desperate to save his wife, establishes an illegal clinic beneath a Tube station, leading him and his partner into a complex web of criminal activity and moral compromises. The show explores themes of desperation, morality, and the lengths people will go to for those they love, all while maintaining a suspenseful and visually striking atmosphere.
response.spoiler_rich_plot_summary: The series begins with Daniel Milton's wife, Beth, diagnosed with a rare and rapidly progressing disease. Frustrated by the limitations of conventional medicine, Daniel, a skilled surgeon, begins performing clandestine operations in the tunnels beneath Temple Tube Station with the help of Lee, a resourceful and enigmatic figure who knows the tunnels intimately. Their clinic quickly attracts patients who are unable to access legitimate medical care, often individuals involved in criminal activities. As their operation grows, Daniel and Lee become entangled with dangerous individuals and organizations, including drug dealers, human traffickers, and corrupt officials. Daniel's actions have profound consequences for his family and career, forcing him to confront the ethical boundaries he has crossed. The series follows the escalating risks and moral compromises as they attempt to maintain their secret clinic while navigating a treacherous underworld, ultimately revealing a larger conspiracy that threatens to expose their operation and endanger everyone involved. The series concludes with the exposure of the clinic and the consequences for Daniel and Lee, leaving their futures uncertain.
response.keyword_sentence: Temple is a suspenseful crime drama set in the dark underbelly of London, exploring themes of desperation and morality as a brilliant surgeon and his enigmatic partner navigate a dangerous world of illegal medical procedures and underground networks.
